title: PBE servers Down?
body: Recently, I've wanted to make an account on the PBE servers, to test new things, but the signups have closed since the beginning of April, and  since haven't opened up, and it's very annoying. Can you give me some help or general advice?

replies.body: Those PBE signups are closed for maintenance at the moment. I'm not 100% sure on when they'll be open again, but you'll be able to know for sure by checking up on the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
